trans-unit.source: Provides a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> objects for an ASP.NET server control.
This class cannot be inherited.
This collection is a dictionary containing all the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinding> objects on an ASP.NET server control.
You can access the objects contained in this collection through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor> interface.
Any <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinding> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection> objects associated with a server control exist only at design time.
They do not exist at run time and, therefore, are not accessible during run time.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> class.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection.
The data-binding object to add to the collection.
Occurs when the collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> objects is changed.

The changed event occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Add%2A> method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Clear%2A> method, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.Remove%2A> method is called.
Removes all <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection.
Determines whether the data-binding collection contains a specific <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> object.
The name of the object to locate in the collection.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> contains an element with the specified name; otherwise, `false`.

Copies the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> values to a one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref>, beginning at the <xref href="System.Array"></xref> object's specified index.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the values copied from <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>.
The index in the array, specified by the array parameter, where copying begins.
Gets the number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> object.
The number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>.
Returns an enumerator to iterate through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> that contains the collection's members.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection is read-only.
`true` if the collection is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection is synchronized (thread safe).
Always `false`.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> object with the specified property name.
The name of the property to be found.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> with the specified property name.
If no object with the specified name exists, this value is `null`.

Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> object associated with the specified property name from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection and adds it to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings"></xref> collection.
The property name associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> to be removed.

Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection and adds it to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings"></xref> collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> to be removed from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref>.

Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> object, associated with the specified property name, from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection and controls whether to add the binding to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings"></xref> list.
The property associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> to be removed.
A Boolean value that indicates whether to add the property name to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings"></xref> list.
`true` indicates that the propertyName parameter will be added to the property, and `false` indicates that propertyName will not be added to the property.
Gets an array of the names of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> objects removed from the collection.
The array of names of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> objects removed from the collection.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection"></xref> collection.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to be used to synchronize access to the collection.
